document_data.name: Dhamir Ercals
document_data.mainbody: '''Dhamir Ercals''' was the high priest of [[Cyric]] in [[Darkhold]] and one of the [[Zhentarim]] leaders of the fortress in the [[1370 DR|Year of the Tankard, 1370 DR]].
document_data.History: Dhamir led the [[Second Banedeath]] in Darkhold, purging all non-Cyric followers. Impressed, [[Sememmon]] offered Dhamir command of the keep, which he quickly accepted, becoming the leader of the Cyricist Zhents there. But Dhamir's aims were greater: he wanted to assume control of the [[Twin Towers of the Eternal Eclipse]] and use them to advance in the Zhent hierarchy. He also started plotting an evil crusade against eastern powers like [[Mulhorand]] and [[Iyachtu Xvim]].
